name: NOAA SCAT Tools
tagline: Collection of tools and utilities to facilitate data management of SCAT data during oil spills
body:
#![NOAA ARD](http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/79/NOAA_logo.svg/200px-NOAA_logo.svg.png)
NOAA SCAT Tools - Version 0.1.0
========================================

###CONTENTS
These files include databases, scripts, data templates and executables that have been developed for managing Shoreline Cleanup Assessment Technique (SCAT) data by the NOAA Emergency Response Division (ERD).  This toolbox includes five major components: 

1.)	Microsoft Access database and interface to store and enter tabular SCAT data 

2.)	ESRI shapefile templates to store spatial SCAT data

3.)	ESRI ArcGIS toolboxes and python scripts to facilitate the entry and analysis of spatial and tabular SCAT data in ArcGIS

4.)	A stand-alone report generator program to perform rapid tabular data analysis and generate summary products, and:

5.)	A stand-alone spatial snapping program to conduct rapid spatial analysis and generate summary products.  


These tools are developed for use in Microsoft Access 2010 and 2013 and ArcGIS versions 10.0, 10.1, and 10.2.

###CHANGES IN THIS VERSION
- removal of various MC-252 specific features
- bug fixes


###INSTALLATION

1.) These files should be unzipped and placed together in a specific directory on the users computer.  

2.) Follow tool-specific installation instructions in the accompanying documentation
